title: Nail Art Stamp Stamping Templates Stamping Tool Set 2.8cm Clear Silicone Stamper Scraper Stamping Plate Guide Template 6PCS
summary:
Nice set. "Jeff's Wife" - I got these when they were an Add-On Item for $3.99, definitely worth the price. The stamper works great, I didn't even wash it first (even though you should always wash new stampers before first use), and it's slightly (I do mean slightly) softer then other clear stampers I own.

If you're new to stamping or not familiar with clear stampers, they are more delicate than opaque ones and tear easily, so be gentle with it. Wash it with dish soap & warm water, dry with a paper towel and clean it with a lint roller or tape. Never buff it or use acetone, you'll make it cloudy defeating the purpose of a clear stamper. When picking up, ROLL GENTLY over the image if you apply too much pressure it won't pick up. When applying the image to the nail press straight down (again, with GENTLE pressure) and rock side to side or roll from side to side. Don't push the tip of the nail into it, it will tear.

All the plates stamp great, I didn't swatch every image, although plates 29 & 41 have shallow etching (in my experience this is normal for BP plates) so the thinner scraper is a nice addition. It's not as thin as the 0.5mm and not a thick as the 1mm ones I own, I'd say it's 0.75mm (I didn't get out the calipers). There are different size images, a little for every nail size. But I do wish the water marble designs were bigger, I'm not a Water Marble Witch yet. Plate 52 is great for lead lighting or Sharpie water coloring.

The stamping guide works like it's supposed to, I've added a photo to show how it's used just in case it's confusing. I have a set of 4 templates from another brand already, there's not much difference in size or thickness of the metal but the designs are different. The edges aren't finished, like a plate with no backing, but I don't think it would cause anyone to slice their finger open unless you're being extremely careless.

All in all a great set. | Plates work great with other stamper. Having a hard time getting the stamp to pick up. Plates work great with other stamper. | Love it!. Does the work. Its good for the price. I wish it came in a better presentantion for gifts but its ok. | The plates alone are more than worth the price.. This is such a good deal! The stamping plates alone are *well* worth $3.99, even with shipping added. I have always found Born Pretty plates to be good quality, and these are no exception. All the designs I have tried so far (most of them) have been well etched. The plates have sturdy plastic backings that extend slightly beyond the edges so you can grasp them without worrying about getting cut. It's nice to have such a variety of different style designs to work with.The scraper is credit card style, which I like, but it is a little thinner and more flexible than I am used to using. I like a bit more body than this one has. Still it is usable. The stamper is small but nice. I like the transparent style so I can see where I am placing an image. I had a little trouble picking up polish with it at first, so I primed it by repeatedly stamping it on a lint roller, and now it works just fine. All in all, I would say this could be an excellent starter kit for anyone wanting to try nail stamping.

The template with cutouts is something I hadn't tried before. The way it works is that you apply polish to the stamping plate and scrape it. Then lay the template on the stamping plate, and stamp on/through the opening. You need a fairly soft stamp for this to press down through the opening. (The one in this kit works fine.) Then you stamp your nail. You have to work fairly quickly to get it placed after scraping the polish (or use polish that dries slowly), but it does work.. I will say that the cut out areas are a little bit on the large side for my not too long nails. It might be fun to try using it to make decals, but I haven't gotten so far as trying that yet.

So as a starter kit, or to expand your plate collection I would recommend this item. Note: I have no affiliation with the seller, and purchased this with my own funds-no promotional discount. | The plates alone are more than worth the price.. This is such a good deal! This was my first experience with stamping, so I can't compare, but I did learn that I can use just about any nail polish, they will just look a bit lighter, since it's only one coat. The stamping plates alone are *well* worth $3.99, even with shipping added. I have always found Born Pretty plates to be good quality, and these are no exception. All the designs I have tried so far (most of them) have been well etched. The plates have sturdy plastic backings that extend slightly beyond the edges so you can grasp them without worrying about getting cut. It's nice to have such a variety of different style designs to work with.The scraper is credit card style, which I like, but it is a little thinner and more flexible than I am used to using. I like a bit more body than this one has. Still it is usable. The stamper is small but nice. I like the transparent style so I can see where I am placing an image. I had a little trouble picking up polish with it at first, so I primed it by repeatedly stamping it on a lint roller, and now it works just fine. All in all, I would say this could be an excellent starter kit for anyone wanting to try nail stamping.

The template with cutouts is something I hadn't tried before. The way it works is that you apply polish to the stamping plate and scrape it. Then lay the template on the stamping plate, and stamp on/through the opening. You need a fairly soft stamp for this to press down through the opening. (The one in this kit works fine.) Then you stamp your nail. You have to work fairly quickly to get it placed after scraping the polish (or use polish that dries slowly), but it does work.. I will say that the cut out areas are a little bit on the large side for my not too long nails. It might be fun to try using it to make decals, but I haven't gotten so far as trying that yet.

So as a starter kit, or to expand your plate collection I would recommend this item. Note: I have no affiliation with the seller, and purchased this with my own funds-no promotional discount. | Cheap and not in a good way. Save your money. It does not work. I can't get it to pick up the nail polish at all. | It works.. The stamper works perfectly. I bought this one hoping it would transfer well, and it does. I like that it is clear so I can see where the stamp will be. The plates are a nice variety too! 1 negative, the clear rubber part falls out a lot. | Works exactly as expected! This was my first experience .... Works exactly as expected! This was my first experience with stamping, so I can't compare, but I did learn that I can use just about any nail polish, they will just look a bit lighter, since it's only one coat. And I also learned to roll over the plates very gently, without too much pressure--otherwise the design won't transfer onto the stamper. | Placas de born pretty. Muy buenas las placas me gustaron mucho👌👍😀

features: SECURE PONYTAIL HOLDER: Pulleez is a great alternative to the average hair tie, and you don't have to worry about constant pulling and breakage! Pulleez is strong, secure, and easy to use!

ACRYLIC CHARM: Pulleez Acrylic Collection is a great addition to your hair "accessories" if you want to be more subtle or bold with our bright, vibrant colors! When in the office or at a fancy event, use our brown or black acrylic to keep your hair secure without drawing attention to your hair tie! If you want a bold moment, or need a safe and secure hair tie for your children, we have plenty of fun, exciting colors to brighten any hair look!

HOW TO USE: Pull elastic over your head ensuring all your strands are through and pull charms to desired length and comfort. To release: press and slide clasp towards charms, releasing hair without tugging or pulling!

ACCESSORY: Pulleez doesn't just look good in your hair, it doubles as a charmed bracelet. Wear Pulleez on your wrist just in case you need it on the go! Pulleez is extremely durable, strong, and you won't have to worry about the elastic becoming loose or stretched!

THE PULLEEZ STORY: Created on a whim by Diana Wright out of necessity to help pull back fashion models' hair quickly and gently while getting their makeup done, Pulleez became an instant hit and soon were spotted on the runway! Pulleez has now evolved and is available to the everyday consumer, and are leading in the luxury ponytail accessory market. The success of initial designs sparked the creation of additional accessory lines that enhance the company’s quality and aesthetic.

title: Celavi Aqua Detangler Professional Salon Hair Brush (Sky Blue)
summary:
Works well and without pain, but protective ends come off after a while. I bought this brush at a discount in exchange for an honest review. I'd seen all the wet brushes being sold at our local salons, but I never bought one because it seemed a bit gimmick-y. Having given this one a try, I'm kind of wishing I'd bought one sooner! The bristles are soft and flexible, and it never hurts to pull it through my hair. It detangles hair quickly and is easy to clean. My 4-year-old complains occasionally that it pulls at her tangles, but it is relatively rare, and a HUGE improvement over her old brush.

EDIT 2/12/18: Unfortunately, the little balls on the ends of the bristles started popping off late last year, and the bristles really hurt without them. We're tossing this one and have bought actual brand-name wet brushes as replacements. I think I like the brand-name brushes a bit more, though it's hard to compare when it's been over a year since this brush was new. Hopefully the brand-name ones last a bit longer. | Soft yet goes through my daughters thick hair like water. This brush is Great for the price and it was just as described. My daughter loves the color and the handle she said was super nice to hold and use. Will buy from this business again !!!! | Awesome for Thick Hair!. I thought if any hair would put a brush to the test it would be mine. I have very thick, wavy hair that goes halfway down my back. I usually only brush it when wet because otherwise the tangles and poof are insane. I got this brush with the expectation it would be like every other brush but it was't, it goes through my thick hair very well and doesn't pull or tug. I've brushed my hair when both wet and dry with this brush and it quickly removes snarls and feels great. After I brushed my dry hair it was so smooth. Typically my hair gets poofy when brushed but it felt smooth with this brush.

My daughter, who has very fine hair, has walked around the house just brushing her hair with this because she likes the way it feels on her head.

The only possibly negative thing with this brush is that it goes so smoothly through my hair that it doesn't really catch and pull it when I am doing things like trying to change where my part is. I have to get a comb for that, which makes sense anyway. I love this brush!

*I did receive a discount on the product in exchange for an honest review, but I would buy it again full price with no question :)

Two brush heads - one red, one blue - per pack.
Amazon.com

These age-appropriate brush heads have rubber molding to protect children's sensitive teeth. Their soft bristles are designed especially for smaller teeth and developing gums. The Sonicare for Kids brush heads snap on and off for easy cleaning and come in two bright colors. For best results, a new brush head is recommended every three months.

summary:
Awesome Product! 😎. I've wasted so much money trying different shampoos and conditioners trying to make my hair look nice but everything has weighed it down or made it look limp thanks to the added oils like argon, coconut, almond, olive, awapuhi, etc. So I decided to give AmeriDerm a try and omg my hair has never looked and felt better! It's given my hair fullness, body, shine and softness like I've never had before! I just shampoo, rinse and style! High Kudos to AmeriDerm, I'm sold on this product and will never use anything else again! | Awesome Cleansing Product. I purchased AmeriDerm 2-in-1 Body Wash Shampoo for use by my sister with Alzheimer's disease who mixes up different bottles of personal cleaning products when showering. Having one product that cleans both hair and body increases her independence. I found that it rinses extremely well and smells great! Will purchase again. | Fits Very Good in my Gym Bag. I was presciently surprised how good this body wash is. The scent is not too strong and it goes a long way in usage than other types of this product. The small size is also a plus, because it fits really good in my eBags pack-it-flat toiletry bag and does not leak while stored in it (I keep my shower gel wrapped up in a plastic bag as a precaution). To show the size a little better, I included pictures of it on my toiletry bag and laying in my hand.

The only reason I am not giving it 5-stars is because it is a little too pricey for what you get and it would be nice if the cap was removable. | Baby to Mom Its Good. Perfect for the whole family! Eczema healing | Great product. Very nice product. Love the sent. | Not bad.. This stuff is really gentle and I use it for everything...body wash, shampoo, in our hand soap dispensers and even a bubble bath for my toddler. Docked stars because A) the bottles leak easily; and B) This product is manufactured for hospitals and nursing homes, and the cheap packaging, wacky color and inoffensive but strangely artificial scent don’t really let you forget that. Other than those things, a good inexpensive multi use product. | Gentle. I gave it as a gift. They loved it. | Used it once in a hospital, and I'm still using it. I was diagnosed with a mental illness, and confined to a hospital for 4 weeks and this soap was my only solace. Because of the almost cheap yet wonderful scent it has, I found myself stealing entire bottles and confining it to my room. It has a wonderful scent and I've been using it for the last 3 years because of the immense comfort it gives me. It doesn't provide moisture or have a lingering scent. It just smells good and makes me feel the same. It's a comfort for me. And most of all, keeps me clean

title: Bass Brsushes | Esthetician Grade Bath & Body Brush  |   100% Natural Bristle   |   High Polish Acrylic Handle   |   Oval Style   |   Crystal Clear Finish  |   Model 79 - CLC
summary:
This is my second brush..... I love it...I only needed a new one because I whore my first one out... | Best back brush I ever used. Glad you carry it.. terrific product | Great brush for shower!. I have been on the search for just the right brush - plastic handle with natural bristles, and I think I found it. The bristle softness is listed as 'medium' and are exactly that - not too soft, not too firm and they do a good job of scrubbing. I wanted natural fiber because the last cheapy brush I owned had plastic bristles that didn't hold soap too well - this brush keeps the lather going. I wanted a plastic handle because the last wooden brush I owned turned black and cracked (all wood handles will do this in the shower - it's just a matter of time because, well, that's what wood does in a damp environment). The brush head measures approximately 2.75" x 3.75" - this size just gets the job done. I just got it today, but will update review in a few months to show how long this guy will last being used mostly daily. From my one use i would def. recommend this as a 'buy'

Edit: UPDATE - 4 months later - this brush has held up very well, having been used at least 4 times a week for at least 3 months. As shown in the pic some of the bristles are just slightly frayed, as one would expect from a natural bristle brush, and they also have not turned black. I dropped the brush once on my cement-like shower pan and the handle did not chip. Note to manufacturer: after having used this brush, I would like to make a recommendation on an upgraded premium next-gen version of this brush: 1) would be nice if the brush had about 50% larger brush head for my larger body 2) even though the handle of this one is ribbed for better grip it still is slightly slippery when wet, I would pay a premium for a rubberized handle 3) i like stiff bristles, so if there was a stiffer bristle option for this that would be cool .

To sum it up, still very happy with this purchase, and would still totally recommend. | Brush bristle loss and distortion. This brush started to lose its bristles almost from the start. The brush head got distorted even though it was hung up each time that it was used. I’ve had Bass brushes in the past, finding them sturdy , but this one failed the test.

title: Hand Carved Neem Wood Baby Comb ~
summary:
Three Stars. Comb is tough for thick hair | 2 of 5 were nice (40% success rate). I ordered five of these combs and of the five that I received three had cracks in the wood and one was also very warped. The two that were in good condition appear to be very nice; they're attractive, well sanded, and the wood has a nice aromatic scent to it. The problem I have is just that the rate of success in receiving a well made comb doesn't appear to be very good, two out of five, that's only a 40% chance of receiving a well made item.

The flaws were very easy to spot even before removing the combs from their packaging (they came individually enclosed in clear plastic packages). I'm not sure how the person who shipped them out did not notice the defects. All I can think is that he/she either didn't look at the items being sent or they just didn't care if they were damaged. If you do order this item you may want to send the seller an email with your order number and request that they look the comb over before shipping it out. Hopefully you have better success than I did.

----UPDATE 10/30/2013-----
A few days ago I contacted Amazon and informed them of the defective combs in my order. They responded and assured me that they would be going through their stock of this item in order to help prevent anyone from having the same misfortune I did. Hopefully all the damaged combs will be weeded out of Amazons inventory for now. I hope that helps everyone out! Good luck on your order! | Smaller than I thought. The comb has rounded edges which is nice so it wont hurt his scalp, but you do have to comb on a little bit of an angle to catch the hair. It is smaller than I thought, like 5in or so, but it is easy to grip and overall I like it and would recommend it. | Smells great, but hard to use on knotted hair. High quality comb, but it is small, so can be hard to hold. Also, thought I would like it for removing knots from my toddler's hair, but it isn't. Have to use a wider tooth comb first, then this one to finish up. | very satisfied. quick shipping and great quality. the comb is so cute. i was very happy with this purchase. i would recommend this for new moms.

features: LIQUID LIPSTICK: Lip Whip is a long-lasting, smudge proof, and waterproof liquid lipstick that goes on as a liquid and dries as a metallic matte. Provides all-day coverage in just one pigmented application. Stickiness can result if product is not allowed ample time to dry or if product is layered with more than 3 layers.

SMUDGE PROOF: Don't worry about eating your makeup with our Lip Whips. They stay on your lips not your food! Our Lips Whips won't stop you from kissing a loved one or biting into something messy. Apply your Lip Whip and leave it at home. Don't worry about reapplying.
BERRIED: Our Berried Lip Whip is a metallic red with hints of deep purple. We recommend Berried as a topping. It looks great on top of Raspberry Tiramisu or She's Just Jelly.
INGREDIENTS: We focus on using high quality and heatlhy ingredients. Our products are cruelty-free and contain vegan and paraben free ingredients with your skincare in mind.

BEAUTY BAKERIE: A powerful story of resilience and inspiration, Cashmere Nicole founded Beauty Bakerie in 2011 with the mission to be sweet and sweeten the lives of others. The Beauty Bakerie brand is a direct reflection of Cashmere's perseverance and passion for high-quality, healthy ingredients that enhance everyone's beauty every day.

summary:
Trust what you know!. I used this over 25 years ago. After trying many other brands I decided to go back to yardley and it was the best thing I ever did! | Overly drying. I received this product complimentary from Influenster and Yardley in exchange for my honest opinion.

I have used Yardley London bar soaps before; but it had been years, so I was looking forward to trying again. I always see them in my local dollar store and think they smell nice, but couldn't remember why I didn't buy them again.

Now I do.

Heavily fragranced, overly drying, and has added dyes. I do like that they are SOMEWHAT natural and that the packaging is earth friendly, but just cannot justify even spending a dollar on it when there are so many other great options for the same price. They feel almost misleading with their approach, like they want to appear more animal and earth friendly than they actually are. Product just doesn't match advertising.

The box states it also exfoliates, but I could not feel any exfoliating properties whatsoever. Left my skin extremely dry and flakey all over. This is a hard no for me.

summary:
Two Stars. Colors weren't as shown. | Four Stars. Nice polish but I don't care for the colors. | Three Stars. It a good product | Awesome Gel Polishes. Really nice polish and it sets very quickly.

Pros:
1) The colors are nicer in person. I don't like blue or purple polish at all but once seeing them painted and cured they are actually very nice.
2) Great consistency, they weren't gummy or chunky.
3) While curing it didn't spread. ( I have another gel polish that I bought and when cured it spreads and gets on the skin. This one did not do that.)
4) They set within 30 seconds with an LED light. It was awesome.

Cons:
1) I wished they were bigger in size.
2) I wished the colors made more sense. I would have preferred a nude to pink combination. The purple and blue are just so random.

I will update in two weeks and add how long the manicure lasted.

TURN BACK THE CLOCK - This powerful Vitamin C serum restores & neutralizes environmental stressors that can accelerate the signs of aging. Includes a 20% concentration of L-ascorbic acid, a highly effective skin antioxidant and collagen builder.
24/7 PROTECTION - Offering all-day protection against environmental pollutants, the lightweight, non-greasy formula absorbs quickly and transparently in the skin. Recommended for all skin types.

HOW TO APPLY - Use daily in the morning or evening for maximum benefit. Can be added to any skincare routine. Apply evenly & modify use by using fewer pumps until the skin becomes acclimated to the formula.
HOW TO STORE - Storing this serum in your fridge or a cool, dark place will extend the life of it by slowing down the oxidation process that naturally occurs in Vitamin C.

TIMELESS PROMISE - Timeless Skin Care delivers effective results with high concentrations of active ingredients and less fillers + chemicals. All our cruelty-free solutions are made in the USA with zero parabens, fragrances, or dyes.

I have been using this neck cream twice a day since receiving it. Since using this neck cream my neck and décolletage have a firmer appearance. My neck lines have seemed to lessen in appearance, and the skin texture of my neck and décolletage has also improved. I can hardly wait to see what my results will be after a month or two of continued use of this neck cream.

This neck cream contains omega 3/6 essential fatty acids, rice proteins, vitamins A, C, and E, and fruit extracts. It also contains a complex that includes yogurt extract, green tea extract, and blueberry extract, as well as plant derived squalane, which come from the olive tree. This product also contains retinol and peptides which help improve the appearance of the signs of aging.

Overall, I am truly impressed with this Tula Advanced Neck Cream and it will be a product that I will continue to use in my skincare regimen to help combat the signs of aging. title: Polysorbate 20-Cosmetic Grade-16 oz
summary: Good. Use in Essential Oil recipes
combined_text: Good. Use in Essential Oil recipes
features: Emulsifier & Solubilizer
Non Ionic Surfactant
Useful in all kinds of bath and body products
description: Polysorbate 20 is a vegetable derived non ionic water soluble surfactant. It is typically used to mix oils and water in all kinds of popular formulations, like blending additives and fragrances in to water when making things like bath bombs, lotions, creams, sprays and other products. Typically a 1:1 ratio is used, blending your fragrances and water in to the product you are making. It is especially useful since although there are other surfactants that may achieve a similar result they are often higher foaming than polysorbates, which are low foaming. INCI: POLYSORBATE 20

intents: Where to buy emulsifiers for bath products?

title: Extra Battery for Rispironics EverGo
summary:
wrong way to advertise. I bought this product thinking i was bying the same thing shown on the picture, The complete Evergo Portable Oxygen conentrator. WRONG!. what i bought was the extra battery. This is not the way to advertise this product. They should revise the way to put it for sale on Amazon. | It's a good battery, but this is JUST for the battery. As previous reviewers have noted, this is a placement for a BATTERY and ONLY a battery. Don't be fooled into thinking you've found a $4,000 portable oxygen concentrator for a fraction of the price.

Regarding the battery though, what can you say? It's a good battery. A single battery for an EverGo can you give up to 4 hours of use, but more than likely will give you closer to 2.5 or 3. It all depends on your LPM setting. Odds are you will want to. The battery itself should keep its full charge for over a year and then slightly decline it's max charge hold. Also, realistically you'll probably want at 2 for your unit to get that maximum time before you recharge.

The price is okay for the battery. That's pretty much what everyone is charging. If however you're looking to buy 2 of them shop around elsewhere. Most companies selling the EverGo or EverGo batteries will offer a deal if you buy 2 and bring the cost per battery down closer to $225 or even lower.

If you are looking for the full EverGo equipment however, be sure to speak your doctor first. Portable concentrators are not for everyone, so you should speak to a professional about it. Also, if you may want to look around for a company like [...] or others who will do Medicare or insurance reimbursement for the equipment. At $4,000 it's tough to come out of pocket for that kind of money, and if you can find a company that will bill your insurance it makes it a lot easier. | Misleading advertizing. This item is incorrectly advertized. It should say right up front that it is for the battery only and not wait until the very last line of the description. Prior to that last line, the description is for the concentrator - the reference might be that an extra battery comes with the unit.

Until this afternoon, I knew nothing about the prices of oxygen concentrators. When I saw this item, I thought maybe this portable unit was just quite small compared to the large floor standing models.

I know it's a "buyer beware" country, but I should think that Amazon would be more careful, if for no other reason than to protect their own reputation.

Item being reviewed: Respironics EverGo Portable Oxygen Concentrator - Extra Battery - A16285 03. Description: The Respironics EverGo Portable Oxygen Concentrator is an FAA approved portable oxygen concentrator developed by a trusted name in oxygen therapy equipment. Able to provide more oxygen in pulse settings per minute than any other portable oxygen concentrator, the EverGo Portable Oxygen Concentrator features a compact, lightweight design and long battery life, making it the ideal oxygen concentrator for those who like to travel. Buy your Respironics EverGo Portable Oxygen Concentrator today, and enjoy the freedom of travel without limitations! This is for ONLY the Extra Battery for the Respironics EverGo Portable Oxygen Concentrator. | Respironics EverGo Portable Oxygen Concentator - Extra Battery. OOPS! I ordered the item shown in the photo and it's not the "unit", it's just an "extra battery", which is of no value unless you have the unit, which we don't have. I had no idea "the unit" cost $4,000+ (I guess it's the unit that the "extra battery" is for).

This ad needs to be revised. Showing a photo of "the unit" and selling just the "extra battery" is not the way to go.
combined_text:
wrong way to advertise. I bought this product thinking i was bying the same thing shown on the picture, The complete Evergo Portable Oxygen conentrator. WRONG!. what i bought was the extra battery. This is not the way to advertise this product. They should revise the way to put it for sale on Amazon. | It's a good battery, but this is JUST for the battery. As previous reviewers have noted, this is a placement for a BATTERY and ONLY a battery. Don't be fooled into thinking you've found a $4,000 portable oxygen concentrator for a fraction of the price.

Regarding the battery though, what can you say? It's a good battery. A single battery for an EverGo can you give up to 4 hours of use, but more than likely will give you closer to 2.5 or 3. It all depends on your LPM setting. Odds are you will want to. The battery itself should keep its full charge for over a year and then slightly decline it's max charge hold. Also, realistically you'll probably want at 2 for your unit to get that maximum time before you recharge.

The price is okay for the battery. That's pretty much what everyone is charging. If however you're looking to buy 2 of them shop around elsewhere. Most companies selling the EverGo or EverGo batteries will offer a deal if you buy 2 and bring the cost per battery down closer to $225 or even lower.

If you are looking for the full EverGo equipment however, be sure to speak your doctor first. Portable concentrators are not for everyone, so you should speak to a professional about it. Also, if you may want to look around for a company like [...] or others who will do Medicare or insurance reimbursement for the equipment. At $4,000 it's tough to come out of pocket for that kind of money, and if you can find a company that will bill your insurance it makes it a lot easier. | Misleading advertizing. This item is incorrectly advertized. It should say right up front that it is for the battery only and not wait until the very last line of the description. Prior to that last line, the description is for the concentrator - the reference might be that an extra battery comes with the unit.

Until this afternoon, I knew nothing about the prices of oxygen concentrators. When I saw this item, I thought maybe this portable unit was just quite small compared to the large floor standing models.

I know it's a "buyer beware" country, but I should think that Amazon would be more careful, if for no other reason than to protect their own reputation.

description: A daily face wash that makes your skin soft and clean without stripping out the moisture - so your face won’t feel tight, dry, and cracked. Don’t get put off by the weird looking INCI names FDA asks us to put on our label. We only use sources from plant derived ingredients.The chemical-like names are just the representation of the specific organic compounds from plants. We can’t just say olive oil on the label, we need to tell the FDA exactly which active organic compound that’s in the olive oil. We only use the highest quality, plant derived ingredients. *Glycerine - extracted from olive oil - soothes your skin *Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate - a soybean derived surfactant *Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate - a coconut derived surfactant *Myristic acid - it’s not an acid, it’s a fatty acid (building block of lipids) extracted from coconut oil *PPG-10 Methyl Glucose - vegetable-derived humectant that keeps the moisture on your skin *Sodium Citrate - a buffering agent that’s commonly used in food additives to increase stability *Yogurt powder - extracted from yogurt probiotic - softening skin *Phytosteryl/ Octyldodecyl Lauroyl Glutamate - derived from natural plant fatty acid that provides excellent moisturizing feeling without stickiness *Water(Aqua) - lab grade double deionized water

A unisex eau de toilette that begins with zesty bergamot, succulent mandarin and fragrant jasmine on a woody background of aromatic maté leaves, sandalwood and cedar.

description: The House of Fragonard...a passionate dedication. It was shortly before the First World War that Eugène Fuchs, an entrepreneur at heart who had already been seduced by the magic of perfume, decided to set up his own perfumery based on the novel concept of selling perfumery products directly to the tourists who were beginning to discover the French Rivera’s charms. Parfumerie Fragonard was opened in 1926. Eugène Fuchs chose to name it after the famous Grasse-born painter, Jean-Honoré Fragonard (1732-1806), as a tribute to both the town of Grasse and to the refinement of 18th-century arts. Similarly, the choice of name expressed his desire to run his business in accordance with traditions. This spirit has been loyally perpetuated by the three succeeding generations who have run and are still running the company.

summary:

This is the one product I've tried in a long, long time that actually made my hair feel and look thick and lustrous without the greasy residue left over by some other products. I highly recommend for use on natural and tightly curled hair. Your hair will be easy to comb and style, and you'll be even happier if you purchase the double-pack. | LOVE THE SHINE AND SOFTNESS IT GIVES MT HAIR AND THE SMELL. WOULD BUY AGAIN | Great for all types of hair!. I bought this at a local hair shop to try on my naturally curly, sometimes flat ironed hair. I wanted something that would moisturize and give me shine without weighing down my fine hair..
First off, this smells fantastic, and has no silicones or alcohol, so it won’t dry out your hair. It really DOES illuminate your hair and make it shiny..doesn’t really feel oily, just a little slick (coconut oil)
Secondly, when straightened, my hair is below my shoulders-and first use I sprayed about 4.5 sprays from the middle to my ends-THAT WAS WAY TOO MUCH! My hair definitely looks shiny, but also greasy-so I have to say-LESS IS MORE. Weirdly enough, it didn’t weigh my hair down?!!
Next use, I will spray it directly in my hands then apply it that way.
I don’t recommend spraying directly to your hair.
Lastly, this DEFINITELY controls frizz! I’m going to sleep with a bonnet on and see how it does with a flat iron in the morning…
For reference, I have mix-textured hair. My sister says I would be a 4c, naturally curly. | Good product. Very good product smells good not to think not to thin

title: Footmate System Foot Scrubber w/Rejuvenating Gel (Blue with Blue on Blue)
summary:
Great!. My wife loves this. Hoping to get another one soon..... | Does not grip all shower floor surfaces. The general design is fine. I didn't find it super easy to use but that is because it would not grip to the floor of my shower - which slip resistant and has a finely textured surface. The little suction cups won't stick to it so I have to step on one wing, to hold it in place, try and scrub my foot and then reverse the process. My shower walls are smooth so I stuck it to the wall but periodically it lets go and crashes to the floor. If I knew what I know know - I wouldn't have ordered it because it doesn't work well in my shower. | Soft- bristled and large foot scrubber. A lush and soft-bristled foot scrubber that's large enough to stay put on the shower floor. On the bottom are suction cups as most foot scrubbers have, but our shower has a modern small stone floor, so the suction cups don't work. This foot scrubber is perfect though because I can put one foot on one of the side "wings" while scrubbing the other foot, and then switch. | Great Foot Scrubber.. I bought the Footmate Foot Scrubber for my daughter last Christmas as a gag gift - she likes going barefoot and usually has dirty feet. No joke - she loved it and it works great. Based on my daughters enthusiastic response I bought one for my elderly mother who has trouble bending to wash her feet. She loves it too and says it makes her feet feel so nice. I guess now I need to get one for myself. | Worth it. Good | Wife likes it. Wife liked it | Dry cracked feet be gone!. This item is amazing! I’m so glad I listened to the reviews and ordered this. It’s seriously one of my best purchases ever and worth every penny. | Works well. I got this for my husband who has difficulty bending to wash his feet. It has worked well. He does feel it is a bit ticklish when he washes his feet, but works well. | GOOD PRODUCT, POOR PACKAGING. I bought this as a funny gift for a fellow flip-flop-wearing coworker. Product looks great, but be aware it DOES NOT COME IN ANY KIND OF PRODUCT BOX. the two items were just wedged in a plain brown box....kind of awkward. It would have been so much better in product packaging! Without a box, it just seems like someone just picked up the items at a swap meet or something...haha. | Fantastic product. I have never written a review before but this is such a good product, I have to share my experience. I love to go barefoot but I'm 60-years-old with bad hip flexibility so sitting on the side of the tub and washing my feet with soap, water, and a washcloth is difficult and doesn't truly get my feet clean.

This product has been such a blessing. I simply run some warm water in my tub/shower combo, stand in the shower, and rub my feet on the scrubber without having to bend over. Each time, my feet are extremely clean. The rejuvenating gel helps with the toe fungus I have (from walking barefoot everywhere, probably.) The scrubber itself is very easy to wash and I use the hole in the top to hang it to dry from my shower caddy where the razors go.

I could not be happier with this purchase! I'm going to buy another one for my 82-year-old Mom who uses a shower chair.

I like to have a lot of smells to choose from on the daily and when I came across this one I had to have it! Its a light, crisp cooling body spray and the smell is just down right intoxicating. It's warm but light and has a hint of vanilla...but this is not your grandmas/librarian/sweet girl next door/cupcake vanilla. It's sexy, sultry and a has a musk like warmth to it but still has some flower/fruity notes in there. Heaven. Guys are always complementing me and asking what perfume I wear lol.

The scent last a good 4-5 hours and with just a little extra spritz touch up you'll be good to go well into the night. This is absolutely becoming a regular in my collection! | Wasnt even able to use it. It arrived broken. Received it broken in pieces and the whole bag was wet and smelling so strong. | Five Stars. features: DRY YOUR HAIR FASTER - Our cotton hair towel is made from plush cotton, a natural fiber that is spun into an ultra-luxurious cloth that’s breathable and moisture-wicking. The thick and soft properties of cotton add a touch of spa elegance to this Turbie Twist while still drying your hair quickly.

SOFT & ULTRA LIGHTWEIGHT - Although it feels thick and fluffy and is able to soak up loads of water, this towel is extremely lightweight when compared to other options. You can carry these hair drying towels everywhere you go. Perfect for the gym, traveling, beach excursions, sports, yoga, camping, outdoors, home, hotels, pool parties and professional hair salon use! You'll like how it works, but you'll love how it feels.

RAPID DRYING: Cuts down on drying time, reducing heat damage (and laundry)! Less moisture means less drying time — and that translates into healthier hair. Over-exposure to heat from blow-dryers contributes to frizziness and damage.

TWIST AND LOOP: A strong elastic loop is easy to use and keeps the Turbie Twist hair turban towel secure on your head - it won't fall off! We’ve simplified your search for the perfect hair towel wrap by doing all the hard work to find the perfect hair towel size. Perfect for getting kids ready.

NATURAL FIBERS: Unlike microfiber, cotton is biodegradable and doesn’t involve the use of chemicals to make. Plus, with a 100 percent cotton hair towel, you’ll know exactly what’s in the fabric – cotton. Nothing else.

features: 🍇 Nutrient-rich grape seed oil are all rich in polyphenols. These polyphenols are anti-inflammatory antioxidants known to retard the aging process and prevent acne outbreaks. Consequently, a number of acne creams and toners use grape seed oil as a carrier oil.

🍇 Grape-seed oil has found it is rich in oligomeric proanthocyanidins. Otherwise known by the acronym OPC, these flavonoids remove free radicals and promote the restoration of collagen at the cellular level, making your skin feel more firm and minimizing more signs of damage. On a tangible level, this contributes to keeping your face smooth to the touch and youthful in appearance.

🍇 SKIN BALANCING Grapeseed oil is light to the touch and never leaves skin feeling heavy with oil. Instead, it effectively moisturizes the skin, balancing both dry and oily patches. When used as a toner, grape seed oil can penetrate blocked pores and cleanse breakouts.

🍇 Talking about hair, given the oil is lighter than olive or coconut oils, it moisturizes and conditions your hair without leaving it feeling greasy. It also reduces dandruff and hair loss and strengthens the hair as well – enabling it to grow faster. The vitamin E content in the oil helps build the hair tissue, and the linoleic acid in the oil promotes hair growth.

🍇 MASSAGE OIL Grapeseed oil has a night thin consistency which makes it easily applicable on skin. Use it as a perfect massage oil on its own, mixed with another carrier oil like HERBAL-UNITY Jojoba Oil
description: Give Your Skin The Care It Needs

Grapeseed Oil is the lightest carrier oil and the favorite of many, It can be combined with essential oils to give you the best results without leaving a heavy coat on the skin. Because of its consistency, grapeseed oil is excellent at controlling and balancing the skin's natural oil production, it has twice the amount of vitamin E than olive oil and provides superior antioxidant protection. Grapeseed oil is also high in linolenic acid, an essential fatty acid (which the body does not produce naturally) that your skin needs to stay at its healthiest.   Our Grapeseed Oil is rich omega-3 and omega-6 content, grapeseed oil is rich in antioxidants, vitamins C, D, and E, it is one of the best oils for overall skin health. Specifically, grapeseed oil is shown to be effective in reducing wrinkles and scars. Because of its high linoleic acid content (up to 70%!), Grapeseed Oil effectively moisturizes without clogging pores, making it a useful acne treatment. With regular use, grapeseed oil can be effective in treating hair loss, dandruff, and broken hair. Herbal Unity’s Grapeseed Oil also helps you heal wounds, strengthen the immune system, and prevent high blood pressure.

features: From the heart of the Pacific Northwest comes a hand salve truly like no other - Portland Bee Balm handmade beeswax based Simple Salve
Our small company crafts an all natural beeswax based salve that soothes, moisturizes and protects your hands and body with nature, care and love

With a focus on creating a simple and pure product, we make Portland Bee Balm Simple Salve with beeswax from Pacific Northwest hives and select organic California olive oil in just the right proportion to create not just a great salve, but the BEST salve
Use anywhere you find skin that needs some extra attention - hands, elbows and heels, too!

We are proud to be a One Percent for the Planet member company and have pledged to give one percent of our revenues to Portland Urban Beekeepers Association – helping people to beekeep in urban environments where connection to the natural world is lacking
description: From the heart of the Pacific Northwest comes a salve unlike all others -
Portland Bee Balm handmade beeswax based Simple Salve for hands and body
. Our small company crafts an
all natural beeswax based salve that soothes, moisturizes and protects your hands and body with nature, care and love
. With a focus on creating a
simple and pure product

, we make Portland Bee Balm Simple Salve with beeswax from Pacific Northwest hives and select organic California olive oil in just the right proportion to create not just a great salve, but the BEST salve. Use anywhere you find skin that needs some extra attention - hands, elbows and heels, too!

It was from Brad’s love of bees, woodworking, and his wife Anika that Portland Bee Balm was born. Anika was searching for a more natural, effective lip balm, and Brad was keeping bees. True to their family's DIY spirit, they took the beeswax from their hives and
set out to create a high-quality product that reflected the social and environmental values they hold true
. Now, our small team in southeast Portland is spreading those values and bee balms to the wider world.

As active participants of the world in which we live, we strive to create meaningful, useful products that are genuinely natural, add value to people’s lives, and help bring awareness to our role in the natural environment.

From our ingredients to our packaging to our interactions with customers, we work to be a business that supports the health and well-being of the environment, our community, and of course, bees and their keepers. We are
proud to be a One Percent for the Planet member company
and have pledged to give one percent of our revenues to Portland Urban Beekeepers Association – helping people to beekeep in urban environments where connection to the natural world is lacking.

features: S8 Red Stencil Paper, S8 Transfer Gel, S8 Tattooing Gel
description: S8's revolutionary tattoo stenciling system, in one convenient and limited edition system kit box featuring the work of Artist Russ Abbott. What's inside? -RED Tattoo Stencil- A revolutionary red freehand and thermal stencil paper. -RED Stencil Transfer Gel- Prepares and cleans the skin, then acts as a transfer medium. -RED Tattooing Gel- A gel that improves ink saturation, needle performance and reduces inflammation. S8 proudly introduces the RED Tattoo Stencil Transfer System. A new beginning. The first ever red-colored freehand and thermal ready stencil paper. The first ever stencil transfer gel that prepares and protects the skin. The first ever tattooing gel that seals the stencil to the skin and creates a near zero-degree coefficient of drag. All designed to work perfectly in tandem. About the Artist: Russ Abbott is a pioneer. Since he began his tattooing career in 1997, Abbott has become a leader in the American Illustrative tattooing movement. But Abbott is not an easy artist to classify. His tattoos are spectacular pastiches, incorporating subjects from literature and American folk art, baroque stylistic flourishes, and sacred geometries. The constant in Abbott’s work is his understanding and application of color theory. The scope of his palette is evident in many of his large illustrative pieces, which demonstrate both his eye for color and his tremendous technical aptitude. Abbott has also been a vocal advocate for the role of digital design and layout in tattooing. He does much of his tattoo design work- from mandalas to outdoor scenes- on computers and has proven the role of software in visualizing tattoos on the body. Abbott owns and tattoos out of Ink & Dagger Tattoo in Georgia, and travels internationally to educate fellow tattooers as well as the general public.

videos.title: Footish by Saffron Foot Mask Introduction

summary:
Foot Peel Mask. I finally got around to using this. I'm not sure why I was so scared of it. Although, anything that's supposed to take the skin off your body should probably cause some trepidation. That being said, test a little on your skin ahead of time to make sure you're not allergic, it's just good practice with new products.

When using, it works exactly as intended and as described. You follow the directions, put them on as instructed, and let them sit awhile. Then, you wash your feet off and do your thing for a few days. After that, you will gross yourself out with your nasty feet as the skin falls off in large, small, etc. pieces. It takes a few days, but at the end it got most of my callouses off and my feet did feel smoother. Now to just keep working at it.

Review by M. Reynard 2021 | So much dead skin. These masked are amazing. They do a great job of removing dead skin without gaveling to grate the skin off. The skin doesn’t fall off for a few days and I was surprised at just how much comes off. | Leaves your feet really soft.. I like the product. It did remove a lot of dead skin. Couldn't penetrate the calluses on my feet but the rest of my feet were super soft! | Smells Great, But No Peeling. It's been several days now since I applied this foot peel mask. I followed the directions; I left the mask on for an hour, and two days later I soaked my feet in hot water. I've used products like this before and seen dramatic peeling about 5 days later. With this one, so far, nada. That's really disappointing. My feet are just as rough and gross as they were to start with.

I do like the smell: the mask smells like real lavender. Otherwise, it's a disappointment. | Helped my dry skin. My feet have taken a hit in the summer heatwave. These masks have helped clear up the dry skin that has built up on my heels. The foot masks fit my feet well (I wear a 9 in women's). There was plenty of room left and they secured well without leaking. They felt moisturizing and were easy to use. The serum smelled clean and didn't burn, sting, or irritate my sensitive skin. With the two step treatment, my feet were cleared up and soft again, so I felt this was a fair value for the price. | Worked, but on the expensive side.. These foot masks work, but they are definitely in the expensive side. I won’t be ordering them again. | I will not purchase again.. I would not buy this product again. It only dried out my feet!

title: FACE atelier Ultra Foundation Pro - Zero Minus
summary:
Customize Your Foundation. Perfect way to customize foundation to your shade of skin as it changes through out the seasons. | Five Stars. wonderful option! | You need this if you are pale. I wish I bought this sooner - as a pale person, even the lightest foundations are too dark. This has lead me on a decade-long quest to find foundations that will match, much less one in a formula I like. My favorite foundation is Tarte's BB cream, and I mixed two drops of Zero Minus with it in a 1 Oz travel bottle. Still too dark, so I added a little more and now it matches very well, albeit the undertone is still not right (Tarte runs very yellow) but I no longer look like I have a dark mask on my face. I hope to find a similar product that will allow me to cool down the color - it looks like Temptu has something along these lines.

I would advise that if you use this, you will most likely have to lighten up your concealer as well or it will look like a dark spot on your face. I used this successfully with a Revlon concealer that has a doe-foot applicator; remove the wand, and you can easily add Zero Minus. Pump and shake to mix. I don't think this would work well with a cream or stick concealer. | Need very little.. Very good coverage and easy to apply. | Perfect for lightening other foundations. I use it to lighten other foundations that are too dark for my really pale skin. It works great for it and mixes well, but it's so expensive for such a small amount I save it for special occasions, as you do need a lot of it to actually lighten other foundations. | Love the foundation, HATE the packaging!. The foundation is excellent! It's nearly opaque, like cosmetic-quality Whiteout or Liquid Paper. I found that it settles into pores and wrinkles if you don't carefully pat it on, but that's true of every foundation and concealer I've tried on my skin.

My only complaint is the packaging! It's a tiny little pump bottle that gives you about ten times as much as you need and there's no way to get just a bit out without taking the top off. I'm going to transfer mine to a little bottle, but a soft plastic squeeze tube would be a much, much better way to package this. | For all my fellow porcelain-skinned people!!!. This product is absolutely fantastic. I have the kind of fair skin that is so pale that I have LITERALLY never found a foundation (drugstore or high end) that has a color light enough for me. I have the kind of fair skin that allows me to artificially color my hair a level 8 copper reddish blonde and people think it's my natural hair color. The kind of skin that is so white that I joke about being transparent. Ok. You get the point.

So anyway, I researched forever to try to figure out how to lighten up my foundation and found this product. I am currently using Urban Decay's Naked Skin foundation (another silicone-based product) in 0.5 (their lightest shade). The Zero Minus blends in perfectly and I apply the concoction on prepped (moisturizer and MOM on my T-zone) and primed (Monistat Anti-Chafe Gel) skin with my Beauty Blender and set it with Nars's light reflecting loose setting powder all over and Tarte's Smooth Operator Amazonian Clay finishing powder on my T-zone (I have extreme combination skin). I set it with MUFE's Mist and Fix setting spray. It lasts ALL DAY and BONUS: it doesn't look like a mask because it's actually the right color!!!

I was having some issues in the beginning with it separating on my skin after about an hour (mostly on my T-zone), but it hasn't been doing this since I changed setting powders (originally, I was using Too Faced's Prepped and Primed, which is a fine product that I love, but on my skin it doesn't seem compatible with my foundation when I add Zero Minus). Like other silicone-based products, this gives a semi-matte finish that is very natural looking.

So what are you waiting for!? If you're so white that you make a polar bear jealous, buy this product! It is high quality, long-lasting, and blends beautifully with other silicone-based foundations. It gives a natural-looking finish and helps eliminate the dreaded line of demarcation that we fair people face with foundation. I will never be without this product again!!

title: [DearPacker] Moisture Mascream 100ml
summary:
My skin is so soft!. I really like this cream! The packaging is super cute, that I don't want to throw the box away. It's a pretty good sized cream. I think this will last me 1-3 months, depending on how often I use it.

It sort of smells like lime, but it's not exactly a citrus smell. Even though it shows images of avocado, it doesn't really smell like avocado. It has a gel-like consistency. A little goes a long way, so I recommend only using a little, and adding more as needed. Thankfully, the smell is subtle once you rub it into your skin, and it is not overpowering at all.

Normally, my skin is too sensitive to have any scented lotion, so I usually use unscented lotion that contains oatmeal. I put the Mascream on my face, and it stung a teeny tiny bit, but nothing like most scented lotions. I massaged it into my skin, and it feels really soft. You need to let it sink in and dry before you put on any makeup, otherwise it will be too much. I think I prefer this as a night time cream.

I got this for free in exchange for my honest review.

title: ETUDE HOUSE White Cloud Mask Peeling 3.38 fl.oz. (100ml) - AHA & BHA White Bubble Wash off Mask, Removes Dead Skin Cell, Skin Smooth Double Peeling Mask
summary:
Highly Recommend this Peel. This is a huge bargain for what it does. It exfoliates like high-end. I heard about it somewhere and was surprised. I tried it and was even more surprised. Etude House is totally bringin’ their “A game”. Well done! I purchased this after some research as I wanted an exfoliating product that didn’t scratch my skin, so something like a glycolic peel appealed to me. :-) This one was very affordable but received ratings like ones triple the price. The bottle is 3.38 fl. oz. , which is a nice amount, especially for the price.

The product is a bubble mask, and it was the first time, I think, I ever tried a bubbling mask. It is fun, to tell the truth.

The affect is a clearer, brighter complexion after use. It really does a great, even, deep clean and gets the surface layer off gently. It has a tiny bit of a scent but it is pleasant and it didn’t bother my sensitive skin (I normally don’t like fragrance). I will definitely repurchase once this is near finished.

title: Magic Twist Barber Hair Sponge - For Dreads, Afros, Twists
summary:
Perfect To Tame Hair…. Pros: Lightweight, Easy To Use
Cons: Name Of Brand Not On It Like Picture

I bought this item for my brother. He’s growing his hair out, not to get “dreads” per se, because that’s not really an acceptable appearance for a medical school student, but he just wants his curls to be “more apparent” as he states. Here is his review (note… the boy is limited with his words, lol):

So happy that my sister found it in her heart to get me this. I’ve been stressing over my hair, and needed a way to “contain it,” if you will. My main purpose was NOT to make dreads, but to define a curl pattern… this sponge helps with that. It’s so easy to use. I wake up in the morning… do all my morning rituals, then I rub this in my hair, vigorously, for a few minutes, and I’m good to go.

I usually go to the barber to get my sides trimmed, and I leave the top. After I go, I’ll use this product right after and see how it does.

As for now, I like this. I’ll continue to use it. Kudos for making a product very similar to the original. I recommend this item. Thanks!

This is an honest review, so if you find my review helpful in anyway, please click the “helpful” button!! I purchased this item for free or at a discount in exchange for my honest and forthcoming review. I hope this helps! | I thought that this would be a nice tool to have for the summer when I am .... I have naturally curly, kinky hair. I have seen these hair sponges in plenty of YouTube hair tutorials. I thought that this would be a nice tool to have for the summer when I am able to rock my fro a bit more. The way this sponge works is that you lightly press it onto damp hair and move the sponge in small circles all around your hair. The end result is a bunch of neat little twists all over your head. It's really cute.

This package arrived on time. I had a bit of trouble opening the package, but that's okay. The sponge itself is black, and has a topper that is a bit stiffer and is blue. The blue part of the sponge goes in your hand and the black part of the sponge goes towards your hair. There are small-medium sized holes in the sponge. These holes help to make the twists in the hair as the sponge is moved around the head. I was excited to try this sponge, but was a bit disappointed. I think my natural hair is too long for it to work like I wanted it too. I have armpit length hair and it is difficult to get my hair to stand on end. I tried this sponge on my brother, who has a much shorter fro, and it worked for him. He was able to get a lot of definition in his hair. I think that this product works very well on shorter natural hair rather than long hair. I will give it another try soon. I am determined to make it work for me!

I received this product at a discount in exchange for an honest review.

Beaut Barber Hair Sponges help you turn your ordinary hair into something extraordinary. Here at Beaut, we specialize in the Highest Quality beauty tools. title: SHOWJARLLY 22" Remy Tape in Human Hair Extensions 50g 20Pcs/Set Dark Auburn/Vibrant Copper Red Brown (#33) Seamless Skin Weft PU Tape in Human Hair Extensions
summary:
Good Quality, But Wish They Offered Smaller Packs.. First things first, I bought the copper red (#33) extensions in 22". When I bought them I had the carrot top, "ginger red" color, which these did not match, at all. It didnt bother me too much because I was fine dying my hair a bit darker so long as it was still red, which these are, but if you are trying to match a natural red hair I'd recommend trying a different shade.

My fiance applied these for me; he followed a diagram I found online for placement (google images), sandwiched my hair between two extensions then used my flat iron on the top bit to seal the extensions together. If you don't know what I mean, I highly recommend searching on YouTube for a tutorial or two.

I only bought one set, and it ended up being just about perfect for me because my hair is naturally very fine and I have trouble hiding a ton of extensions. I just wish I had two more "sandwiches" for the front as it does look a bit choppy at the front of my head. Luckily I have clip ins to help here when I dont want to clip the shorter hairs out of my face. If you have anything beyond thin, fine hair get 2 - 3 packs.

My only complaint is that they dont offer smaller packs. I wish they offered a half pack, so you arent faced with another $50 for a few more strands.

Aside from that the hair is very soft and I've been able to style it how I want without issue. I haven't washed my hair yet, but I'll update if I experience any issues there. | Great hair for the price!. Great hair for the price. I've been using the same extensions for 3 months and they still look good. Will purchase again. | Worst extensions ever!. I wore these one time and when I took them out they split and were completely unusable for a second time. I will never buy again. | Amazing product. Totally love them. Have Had them in a week. Super soft. Have dyed them to match as color was slightly off my natural. But blended beautifully. Almost zero shed. Super soft . Virtually zero tangles upon washing. Totally recommend definitely worthy. | Color and Tape issues - Color doesnt match at all. I would not recommend. purchased it for my girl and the color does not match the photo at all. Then she was placing them in and they did not stick barely luckily she purchased after market tape to use but they quickly ended up trash as she never liked the color originally.

title: Brow Luxe Tool Kit by Luscious Cosmetics. Shade: Medium
summary:
It's ok.. I have very sad looking eyebrows after years of plucking...raise your hands if you grew up in the 90s! 🖐 I attempted to grow them back out again, but as we all know, they don't grow back. Only a few stray hairs at the bottom grew back, which I decided to keep. I obviously don't want to walk out of the house with unkempt-looking eyebrows, so I use this eyebrow kit...it's good at filling out the sparse areas. The brush is super small, but I have small hands and fingers, so I can deal and I make it work. My eyebrows look somewhat normal now. I'm still looking for better products because it's just ok and I will use it until it runs out. I guess it's still growing on me...I used a pencil before trying powder and as of right now, I like the pencil better. | good. good | Good choice of colors. This product was good since it gave me choices in color plus the "paste" which kept the color stay longer. However, I wish there were more choices of the stencils that came with it. | I will always be sure to have on hand!. Powder glides on effortlessly for a fuller brow look | Very easy to use.. I like this eyebrow kit a lot. Especially as an older gal it helped tremendously to make my brows look fuller and natural. | Overall: Awesome product - better than any pencil. I thought I was doing fine with a brow pencil until I tried this. I'm naturally dirty blond so, it can be hard to find a balance between a 'natural' look and 'runway-style' brows. I was nervous the powders would be to dark, but these shades are perfect. The slanted brush give you more control over coverage than a typical pencil, it just takes a second to get used too. The setting wax holds the color in all day without matting down your brow like some pencils do. Also - it comes with good tweezers and a place to store them, so that's pretty tight too.

Overall: Awesome product - better than any pencil.
Vegan and Cruelty-Free is a huge plus! | So perfect for my style.. I really like that you actually get two colors because I usually combine them for a perfect color that really suits my style. Perfect for all day wear.

I struggled to find something to get the job done, but this product definitely delivered!

I have always been a magnet to any mosquitos. As in, if I step outside, every single one in a two mile radius gets the notification on their tiny phones "BUFFET!1!!!1" and they come swarming.

Unfortunately, I also suffer from incredibly Sensitive Skin. (Yes, that sensitive. Try your best to imagine.)

As in, my-skin-is-so-sensitive-that-I've used-the-same-brand-of-soap/lotion/laundry-detergent-for-TWENTY-FIVE-YEARS-sensitive.

As you can imagine, these issues tend to make summer a rough time for me--bug spray gives me a terrible, TERRIBLE rash, so throw that notion right out of your head.

I have literally tried every single flipping brand and packaging method. I've tried the sprays, the bands. I've tried the fans. I've tried avoidance. Nothing works.

Suffering.

title: ERBA Hair Essence 4.05 fl.oz/120ml Protein Vitamin Minerals from Cereals - Cream Essence - Luxury Aluminum Containers
summary:
Amazing results. When I received this product I immediately opened the package to read the directions as I had planned on using it the next morning after I had washed my hair. I have to agree with other reviewers in that the instructions and English was an atrocious and I assumed the product would be as well. After all, a person would think that with such carelessness in the description of the product, that the product itself would be inferior. Oh, how wrong I was! I have highlighted hair that has also been damaged by a flat iron. I have been wanting to grow my hair out some but with the damage I was doing to my hair, each time I went for a “trim”, my hair dresser would have to cut off too much damaged ends. So, I quit using a flat iron and started using better products on my hair. When I got the opportunity to review this item, I was excited to give it a try and see if it would help. What I found was simply amazing. My hair now feels thick and bouncy and I can’t believe how much easier it is to style. My hair is very fine so the additions of hair products usually just weighs my hair down, but this product does not. I can’t wait until my next trim with my hair dresser and see if she notices a difference…I certainly did. I did receive this item at a discount for an honest and unbiased review and I am grateful for that opportunity. | Like the Product but Needs Readable Directions. I always like to try new hair products so I was excited to get this product as a discount for an honest review. The problem with this product is that because of the packaging you can't read the directions. I have used lots of different products in my day so I think I figured it out on my own. I rubbed a small amount on my hands and ran it through my hair. It has a nice, subtle smell and seemed to give my hair a nice lift without any sticky feeling. I think it is going to be a good product to use in place of the palmade that I usually use. I liked the way it left my hair feeling. I have short hair and am eager to let my husband try it. He is gray and I think this will take tame his fly away hair. | THE SMELL IS HEAVENLY AND DOES THE JOB!!!!. This is a great nutritional supplement ERBA contains Protein, Vitamin and Minerals ingredients derived from Cereals for your damaged or dry hair.
All you need to do is After shampoo, apply appropriate amount evenly to damp or dry hair on damaged areas.... massage thru and let it air dry or with hairdryer. The hair feels so soft and very smooth. I love it. After using it for couple of weeks i see the change in my hair, the split end or dry hair after bleaching almost gone :) so excited !!! i really wanna see the results in like a month of use!!! HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!! THE SMELL OF IT IS HEAVENLY!!! i received this item at discounted price for my honest review.

title: Amazing Ayurveda Premium Massage Oil Sensual 6.8 fl.oz
summary:
Five Stars. Excellent | Great Quality! Smells Amazing. This is my 2nd oil from this company and like I learned the hard way previously you must puncture this bottle before use. I punctured it with a safety pin and was able to use it right away. It has a very fresh musk like scent which I LOVE. I actually used this oil as a moisturizer daily. I have very dry itchy skin and being it is winter it makes matters worse. I applied this oil freshly out the shower while my skin was still damp to seal in the moisture. It leaves a very mild scent behind and I was complimented all day long from co workers. It kept my skin itch free and well moisturized for a full 24 hours!
I also used it for the intended purpose of massages and it helps the hands glide without causing too much greasiness and gets absorbed to the skin at a great rate!

Good stuff that smells good. However, be careful it doesn't get on your nice sheets... Also, could use a better top. Other than that, I'd buy it again. | Absorbs too quickly. Contains several nut oils.. I am a big fan of massage, but, really, who isn't? I look for any opportunity for my hubby to rub my back. I often have an achy neck and shoulders. I wanted to give this massage oil a try for the sensual essential oil benefits. However, there was no description of the actual oil contents. I do not have any allergies, so this was not an issue for me, but if you are allergic to nuts, steer clear of this oil because it contains several nut oils - peanut, walnut and almond. The smell is okay, but not great, only containing lavender and ylang ylang oils for fragrance. It absorbs almost too quickly to be used as a good massage oil. You have to keep adding it as you massage to be able to rub without resistance. These oils did not do anything more for me in the 'sensual' department than any regular massage oil. Also, as has been mentioned, and now has been placed in the description, you have to puncture the inner seal or you could make a huge mess if you try to squeeze it open. Overall, I am underwhelmed by this oil and will not buy it again. | Five Stars. Very nice massage oil. I will definitely buy more.
